tool_description: An API showing different news about movies from various newspapers
name: Movies API
title: Movies API

api_list.name: Get all movie articles from one newspaper
api_list.description: Gets all articles about movies from one specific newspaper
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://movies-api6.p.rapidapi.com/movies/cnn"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movies-api6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://movies-api6.p.rapidapi.com/movies/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movies-api6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
